"Fighting Affairs" is a special Japanese -style izakaya. Among them, salt grilled salmon heads are one of their signature dishes.As soon as the salt -grilled salmon head was on the table, I was attracted by its charming aroma.The salmon head is grilled just right. The skin is slightly crispy, with a salt aroma, exuding a mouth -watering grilled fragrance.The visual effect of this dish is also very tempting. The surface of the fish head is golden color, which makes people unable to move the chopsticks immediately.

As soon as the salt -grilled salmon head was on the table, I was attracted by its charming aroma.The salmon head is grilled just right. The skin is slightly crispy, with a salt aroma, exuding a mouth -watering grilled fragrance.The visual effect of this dish is also very tempting. The surface of the fish head is golden color, which makes people unable to move the chopsticks immediately.

I gently peeled with chopsticks, and the meat of the salmon head was soft and juicy.The oil inside the fish is rich, forming a wonderful contrast with the crispy crispy skin.The taste of salt is not strong, but it just enhances the umami taste of salmon head.Each bite can feel the delicateness and deliciousness of salmon, which makes people want to stop.

This salt -grilled salmon head with lemon juice has a more layered taste.The sour taste of the lemon adds a touch of refreshing, while the salty flavor of soy sauce makes the flavor of salmon more rich.Whether it is a separate taste or with these seasonings, it can bring different taste experience.

The service of the restaurant is also commendable.The waiters are kind and friendly, willing to introduce the characteristics of each dish for us, and provide suitable suggestions.The dining environment is neat and comfortable, giving people a comfortable feeling.
